data.text:
@_horak Just take it easy and take care of yourself. Don’t do nothing crazy alright!

Your boyfriend needs to chill out so let him cool his head. You’ve got people who are rooting for you and supporting you.
@_horak Aghhh that sucks Hora, im so sorry :( i hope you feel better soon!!
@_horak Hope the symptoms are mild and you feel better soon. 🙏🏽
@_horak Ahhh im so sorry horak :( take extra good care of yourself and follow the instructions of your doctor and covid hotline. Wish your boyfriend would be more supportive of you too...
@_horak Oh no! Hopefully you get better soon!
@_horak Also im sure your BF just had a bad day, let him cool off and see if you can get things settled once you feel better
@_horak Oh no please rest all you need to and prioritize your health please! Your health is important!

@_horak Oh no! I'm really sorry to hear that, I'm sure you got a weaker variant so you'll only have coughs and sore throats for a short amount of time. But please take care of yourself as much as possible ok? I dont wanna see you harmed in any way.

@_horak I am wishing you the best and hope you feel much better soon; with little (to possibly no) symptoms.

As for your boyfriend: Today is your day. 
Ignore the haters (if you can) and try do something nice for yourself.  (✧ω✧)

Remember: It'll be alright! It will! ☺️🌼
